features: Vinegar-powered: Strips away trapped residues and odors with the purifying power of vinegar with no Vinegar odor left behind
Never more than 9 ingredients: we use only the necessary ingredients. Our formula has no Artificial preservatives, dyes, Thickeners, or brighteners and is gentle on sensitive skin
The EPA Safer Choice label helps you select products to protect your famiy and the environment
Made without any synthetic fragrances. 50 percent of ingredients are plant derived
Hard water? No problem: removes residue buildup caused by hard water from your clothes by harnessing the power of gentle low pH cleansing to deliver a powerful deep clean
body.description: 9 Elements Laundry Detergent, a plant based* laundry detergent that cleans so thoroughly, it's more than clean, it's a cleanse. Vinegar-powered 9 Elements Laundry Detergent rids fabrics of residues left behind after every wash like hard water metals and dingy build-up while removing tough stains and odors. Our breakthrough formula has no artificial preservatives, dyes, thickeners, or brighteners and is gentle on sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: FIRST, YOUR LAUNDRY WILL NOT SMELL LIKE VINEGAR! I stopped using downy about a year or so ago & was using vinegar until I found this gem! I have super sensitive skin (mostly to chemicals, SLS, etc) but it was hard to switch to eco friendly laundry products cause I wanted that clean laundry smell! After I switched from downy I noticed that the cloths felt different from not using it! They felt better (no like almost waxy feel? And towels don’t repel water now)!!!!!! This softens enough and has a very light, clean smell! Nothing I have (mostly natural fabrics & activewear) feels scratchy, pills excessively, etc.I have a Samsung front loader that is suuuper finicky with it’s dang codes… but this actually helps with the soap buildup (I run the self clean once a month & when i glance at it there doesn’t seem to be much buildup! I have to be super careful in using the recommended dose for the he machine but when I adhere to that I’ve never pulled laundry out that smelled like vinegar!Vinegar is great for new clothes tho! If you remember making tie dye stuff you soak it with a little vinegar to set the dye & I think this really helps my colored clothing (i even use it on activewear)! I’ve also diluted in a spray bottle to brush out old fleece & it works like a charm to make those fluffy again. I also use this spray to refresh some things when I go to steam them to wear them (don’t want that older house closet smell).Once you dry your clothes the eucalyptus scent may not come through, so I personally drop a few drops of EO on wool dryer balls & bam! Wonderfully smelling laundry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well. Prefer the lemon scent but that was out of stock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Is effective as a softener, but I don’t like the smell
reviews.reviewText: Our family prefers natural products, but I just can’t get over the strong vinegar smell of this product. I wish I liked it better but it makes my laundry smell like vinegar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time to purchase this product. My clothes don't typically get "dirty" but do get the usual food or everyday use stains. The thing I like the best is that it really removes odors well. It doesn't leave a strong chemical smell after wash. Just a clean neutral smell. My only complaint is the use of the plastic container but I don't know how to get around it yet. Was hopeful with the detergent "sheets" but they didn't clean well at all imo. Wish they could sell a concentrate where you just had to add water to it. But otherwise, I'll continue to use this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best fabric softener!!
reviews.reviewText: This by far is the best fabric softener that I have found on the market. They stop selling it in my local store, so I was happy to find it here for purchase. I love the smell, it smells soooo good. The eucalyptus is not over powering. It's very pleasant. Best softener makes the clothes soft and smell really delicious. I appreciate the clean ingredients. And I'm a number one fan of this product.
